Dialogue.Mod=HelpfulSpouses.Spouse=Krobu: Umm... I found this food lying around. I thought you might like it...{{ItemId}}
Dialogue.Mod=HelpfulSpouses: Good morning {{NickName}}, I made you a {{ItemName}} for breakfast this morning. I hope you enjoy it!{{ItemId}}
Description.Mod=HelpForHire: We'll deliver you your morning meal.
